zh.doc.Webhook.640103-1: 通知模板结合通知配置为告警消息通知提供支撑。通知模板只能调用同一类型的通知配置服务。
zh.doc.Webhook.640103-3: 1、请求体 请求体中的数据来自于发送通知时指定的所有变量,也可通过自定义的方式进行变量配置。
zh.doc.Webhook.640103-4: 使用webhook通知时，系统会将该事件通过您指定的URL地址，以POST方式发送。

en.doc.Webhook.640103-1: The notification template combined with notification configuration provides support for alarm message notifications. Notification templates can only call notification configuration services of the same type.
en.doc.Webhook.640103-3: 1. The data in the request body comes from all variables specified when sending notifications, and can also be configured through custom methods.
en.doc.Webhook.640103-4: When using a webhook notification, the system will send the event via POST to the URL address you specified.
